wikipedia_page.main: Peter Blackburn (1811 – 20 May 1870) was a British Conservative Party politician.

response: Miles Lampson was the son of Norman Lampson, and grandson of Sir Curtis Lampson, 1st Baronet.  His mother was Helen, daughter of Peter Blackburn, MP for Stirlingshire.
